compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/anilgovindka/CollageDays/Thesis/r.serviceRawFile:
# "org" ensures this Service is used with the correct Serverless Framework Access Key.
org: x23176458
# "app" enables Serverless Framework Dashboard features and sharing them with other Services.
app: lambdas
service: ric-crud-application

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: eu-west-1  # Ensure this matches the region of your layer
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: "Allow"
      Action:
        - "dynamodb:*"         # Allows access to DynamoDB
        - "logs:*"
        - "secretsmanager:GetSecretValue"
        - lambda:GetLayerVersion
      Resource: "*"

functions:
  ricGet:
    handler: functions/ric-get.handler # Adjust the path based on your file structure
    layers:
      - arn:aws:lambda:eu-west-1:557690584148:layer:dependencies-layer:9
    events:
      - http:
          path: ric-get
          method: get
  ricPost:
    handler: functions/ric-post.handler # Adjust the path based on your file structure
    layers:
      - arn:aws:lambda:eu-west-1:557690584148:layer:dependencies-layer:9
    events:
      - http:
          path: ric-post
          method: post
  ricDelete:
    handler: functions/ric-delete.handler # Adjust the path based on your file structure
    layers:
      - arn:aws:lambda:eu-west-1:557690584148:layer:dependencies-layer:9
    events:
      - http:
          path: ric-delete
          method: delete
  ricPut:
    handler: functions/ric-put.handler # Adjust the path based on your file structure
    layers:
      - arn:aws:lambda:eu-west-1:557690584148:layer:dependencies-layer:9
    events:
      - http:
          path: ric-put
          method: put
